dmca.title: [EV1-C2440186A] issue regarding http://www.turbotax-software.net/
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2007 10:53 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2440186A] issue regarding
http://www.turbotax-software.net/

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. issue regarding http://www.turbotax-software.net/ Added by system at
Friday, Jan 5 2007 01:47 pm
X-MailFrom: brams006@umn.edu
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Jan 5 13:47:08 2007
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Fri, 5 Jan 2007 13:47:04 -0600
Return-path: <brams006@umn.edu>
Delivery-date: Fri, 05 Jan 2007 13:47:04 -0600
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
brams006@umn.edu)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1H2v1s-0006c7-31; Fri, 05 Jan 2007 13:47:04 -0600
Received: from mta-m2.tc.umn.edu ([160.94.23.21])  by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from brams006@umn.edu)  with esmtp
(Exim)  id 1H2v1f-000Pzq-NH; Fri, 05 Jan 2007 13:46:51 -0600
Received: from [128.101.29.79] (laotzu.lib.umn.edu [128.101.29.79]) 
        by mta-m2.tc.umn.edu (UMN smtpd) with ESMTP 
        Fri, 5 Jan 2007 13:46:48 -0600 (CST)
X-Umn-Remote-Mta: [N] laotzu.lib.umn.edu [128.101.29.79] #+LO+TS+AU+HN
Message-ID: <459EAB7B.20900@umn.edu>
Date: Fri, 05 Jan 2007 13:48:11 -0600
From: Paul Bramscher <brams006@umn.edu>
Organization: University of Minnesota
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.8 (X11/20061117)
MIME-Version: 1.0
To: abuse@theplanet.com, 
    admins@theplanet.com
Subject: issue regarding http://www.turbotax-software.net/
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Jan 2007 19:47:04.0486 (UTC)
FILETIME=[46711460:01C73102] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Greetings-- 
 
The owner of http://www.turbotax-software.net/ may be infringing on
libel. 
 
Non-authoritative answer: 
www.turbotax-software.net       canonical name = turbotax-software.net. 
Name:   turbotax-software.net 
Address: 70.84.16.107 
NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 
CIDR:       70.84.0.0/14 
NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13 
NetHandle:  NET-70-84-0-0-1 
Parent:     NET-70-0-0-0-0 
NetType:    Direct Allocation 
NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM
NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM
Comment: 
RegDate:    2004-07-29 
Updated:    2006-02-17 
 
If you conduct a search on Google like this: 
"site:turbotax-software.net bramscher" 
 
You'll find about 39 usenet posts of mine on this site.  If you search
and retrieve the same posts from Google Groups you'll note that the
copies of them on turbotax-software.net have been changed or randomly
censored. 
 
I did not grant permission for my writings to be modified.  I'm
requesting that the registered owner turbotax-software.net cease and
desist this activity, and remove these modified versions immediately. 
 
Thank you,
Paul F. Bramscher
brams006@umn.edu 
 
222 Aurora Lane
Circle Pines, MN  55014
home tel. 763-795-0201
